item.title: [HBASE-10387] Add config option to LoadTestTool which allows skipping call to System.exit()

item.summary: Add config option to LoadTestTool which allows skipping call to System.exit()

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Patch v1 adds skip_sys_exit option.
At the end of successful load test, System.exit() would be skipped if this option was specified.
Integration tests and unit tests can successfully use LoadTestTool. Suggest finding out how they do it and do that instead of introducing a hack.
Should have consulted hbase-it module earlier
